name: High School Couple: First Love
description:
High school years are the best ones of our lives. Teenagers turn into adults and live their first romance and love story. Join this love game to experience the thrills of the first date and teen true friendship!

Play now and live this teenager romance story! Look for romance in high school years and have hours of fun preparing the perfect date. Will you fall in love with your best friend? Will you keep your handsome boyfriend or maybe he will look for a new girlfriend in his college? Get ready to flirt because the teenagers love adventure game is about to start! Dress up with your most fashionable outfit and choose your best makeup for tonight. Will your high school love and romance story last forever? Let's find out! Play now!

Features:
- High school love and teenager romance story game.
- Flirt with your next boyfriend and fight for his love!
- Experience the teenagers romance story to live the perfect high school love!

All the teenagers are waiting to live the true love in high school. Now it is your time to experience it too! Join these teenagers and live a true romance in this game! Play now!
